alert.note: Alert for Geauga; Holmes; Lake; Medina; Portage; Stark; Summit; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 2:47AM EDT until April 01 at 3:45AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Portage County in northeastern Ohio... Geauga County in northeastern Ohio... Eastern Medina County in northeastern Ohio... Lake County in northeastern Ohio... Stark County in northeastern Ohio... Summit County in northeastern Ohio... Wayne County in northeastern Ohio... Holmes County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 345 AM EDT. * At 247 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lakeline to Brunswick to 7 miles south of West Salem, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Akron, Canton, Medina, Wooster, Painesville, Willowick, Ravenna, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Millersburg, Cuyahoga Falls, Mentor, Massillon, North Royalton, Kent, Barberton, Green, Alliance, Willoughby and Hudson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Geauga; Holmes; Lake; Medina; Portage; Stark; Summit; Wayne
